long_description: No need to ditch the spare in order to carry your bikes! New from Yakima(R), the Spare Joe straps right to your spare tire and carries two bikes. Features quick attachment and adjustment so you can be on your way in no time at all. Have peace of mind knowing bikes are firmly held by anti-sway cradles with hook-and-loop strap. Bikes can be centered on vehicle by offsetting the support arms. Arms fold down when not in use. Fits spare tire sizes P-205/75R to 32.11/R15. Not intended for tandem or recumbent bikes; carrying bikes with step-through frames requires the purchase of an adapter (sold separately).
short_description: No need to ditch the spare in order to carry your bikes! New from Yakima(R), the Spare Joe straps right to your spare tire and carries two bikes.
